Today in County Clare, it's looking pretty quiet with 1 ft @9s WNW swell and fresh 14 mph ENE winds. Tomorrow stays similar with 1 ft @11s WNW, but the wind eases to 5 mph NE, offering a slightly better vibe. Day after, conditions improve with 2 ft @13s W swell and light NE winds, making spots like Lahinch Beach and Cregg Beach more inviting. Best: day after.
